wikipedia_page.main: Harry James Edwards (29 May 1893 – 7 December 1976) was a self-proclaimed spiritual healer, teacher and author who had a career of nearly 40 years.

response: Brown maintained that she had never had any musical training aside from a few piano lessons, though  paranormal investigator Harry Edwards says: (from on-line copy in Investigator (104), September 2005, retrieved 29 September 2008)

*Harry Edwards (1893–1976), spiritual healer, founded his "Spiritual Healing sanctuary" at Burrows Lea, a house in the east of the parish, in 1946; he went on to found the "National Federation of Spiritual Healers" (NFSH) in 1959. The work of the sanctuary and the NFSH continues today.The Harry Edwards Spiritual healing Sanctuary (Royal College of Psychiatrists).
